query: What is the capital of the United States?

documents.Title: Facts about Carson City
documents.Content: Carson City is the capital city of the American state of Nevada.

documents.Title: North Dakota
documents.Content: North Dakota is a state in the United States. 672,591 people lived in North Dakota in the year 2010. The capital and seat of government is Bismarck.

documents.Title: Micronesia
documents.Content: Micronesia, officially the Federated States of Micronesia, is an island nation in the Pacific Ocean, northeast of Papua New Guinea. The country is a sovereign state in free association with the United States. The capital city of Federated States of Micronesia is Palikir.
